text: No difference was find in accuracy between these different techniques or between open and laparoscopic surgery.Authors also showed that PET was more accurate than MRI or CT.It should be noted that multivariable analysis explorating reasons for heterogeneity showed that the differences in accuracy among included studies could not be explained by the site of LN (pelvic or para-aortic).
